verses.verse: (For the choir director; [set to] El Shoshannim; <S%H7799><s%> Eduth. A Psalm of Asaph.) Oh, give <S%H238><s%> ear, <S%H238><s%> Shepherd <S%H7462><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> Thou who dost lead <S%H5090><s%> Joseph <S%H3130><s%> like a flock; <S%H6629><s%> Thou who art enthroned <S%H3427><s%> [above] the cherubim, <S%H3742><s%> shine <S%H3313><s%> forth! <S%H3313><s%>
Before <S%H6440><s%> Ephraim <S%H669><s%> and Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> stir <S%H5782><s%> up Thy power, <S%H1369><s%> And come <S%H1980><s%> to save <S%H3444><s%> us!
O God, <S%H430><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> us, And cause Thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> [upon us], and we will be saved. <S%H3467><s%>

O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> [of] hosts, <S%H6635><s%> How <S%H4970><s%> long <S%H5704><s%> <S%H4970><s%> wilt Thou be angry <S%H6225><s%> with the prayer <S%H8605><s%> of Thy people <S%H5971><s%>?

Thou hast fed <S%H398><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of tears, <S%H1832><s%> And Thou hast made <S%H8248><s%> them to drink <S%H8248><s%> tears <S%H1832><s%> in large <S%H9605><s%> measure. <S%H9605><s%>
Thou dost make <S%H7760><s%> us an object <S%H4066><s%> of contention <S%H4066><s%> to our neighbors; <S%H7934><s%> And our enemies <S%H340><s%> laugh <S%H3932><s%> among themselves.
O God <S%H430><s%> [of] hosts, <S%H6635><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> us, And cause Thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> [upon us,] and we will be saved. <S%H3467><s%>
Thou didst remove <S%H5265><s%> a vine <S%H1612><s%> from Egypt; <S%H4714><s%> Thou didst drive <S%H1644><s%> out the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and didst plant <S%H5193><s%> it.
Thou didst clear <S%H6437><s%> [the ground] before <S%H6440><s%> it, And it took <S%H8327><s%> deep <S%H8328><s%> root <S%H8328><s%> and filled <S%H4390><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>
The mountains <S%H2022><s%> were covered <S%H3680><s%> with its shadow; <S%H6738><s%> And the cedars <S%H730><s%> of God <S%H410><s%> with its boughs. <S%H6057><s%>
It was sending <S%H7971><s%> out its branches <S%H9524><s%> to the sea, <S%H3220><s%> And its shoots <S%H3127><s%> to the River. <S%H5104><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> hast Thou broken <S%H6555><s%> down <S%H6555><s%> its hedges, <S%H1447><s%> So that all <S%H3605><s%> who pass <S%H5674><s%> [that] way <S%H1870><s%> pick <S%H717><s%> its [fruit]?
A boar <S%H2386><s%> from the forest <S%H9194><s%> eats <S%H3765><s%> it away, <S%H3765><s%> And whatever <S%H2123><s%> moves <S%H2123><s%> in the field <S%H9583><s%> feeds <S%H7462><s%> on it.

O God <S%H430><s%> [of] hosts, <S%H6635><s%> turn <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> now, <S%H4994><s%> we beseech <S%H4994><s%> Thee; Look <S%H5027><s%> down <S%H5027><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%> and see, <S%H7200><s%> and take <S%H6485><s%> care <S%H6485><s%> of this <S%H384><s%> vine, <S%H1612><s%>

Even the shoot <S%H3657><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> has planted, <S%H5193><s%> And on the son <S%H1121><s%> whom Thou hast strengthened <S%H553><s%> for Thyself.
It is burned <S%H8313><s%> with fire, <S%H784><s%> it is cut <S%H3683><s%> down; <S%H3683><s%> They perish at the rebuke <S%H6><s%> of Thy countenance. <S%H1606><s%>

Let Thy hand <S%H3027><s%> be upon the man <S%H376><s%> of Thy right <S%H3225><s%> hand, <S%H3225><s%> Upon the son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> whom Thou didst make <S%H553><s%> strong <S%H553><s%> for Thyself.
Then we shall not turn <S%H5472><s%> back <S%H5472><s%> from Thee; Revive <S%H2421><s%> us, and we will call <S%H7121><s%> upon Thy name. <S%H8034><s%>
O Lord <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> restore <S%H7725><s%> us; Cause Thy face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H215><s%> [upon us,] and we will be saved. <S%H3467><s%>
